attributes.action: Lower the car tax on all LPG vehicles  new and converted.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As LPG vehicles give out less emissions of carbon, these cars even 4/4 should have reduced car tax charges and not be classed along with all 4/4 cars.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
